homeMain.subtitle: At Pizzeria Restaurant, the passion for authentic taste comes alive in every slice. Whether you come for a crispy pizza, a generous portion of pasta, or just the warm and friendly vibe, we’re waiting for you with a meal you’ll love.

produse.label: Products
produse.title: Diverse Products
produse.desc: A menu designed for all tastes: classic or special pizza, creamy pasta, fresh salads, and desserts. Mix and match to your liking and customize your order easily.

plata.label: Payment
plata.title: Card Payment
plata.desc: Pay safely, no cash needed. We accept cards at delivery and online via secure payment session. Get instant confirmation, simple and fast.

comanda.label: Order
comanda.title: Phone Orders
comanda.desc: Prefer talking to someone? Call us and we’ll help you pick the right menu, customize dishes, and place your order in just minutes.

personalizare.label: Customization
personalizare.title: Custom Menus
personalizare.desc: From choosing the side dish to selecting the drink, we give you the freedom to customize your perfect menu.

livrare.label: Delivery
livrare.title: Fast Delivery
livrare.desc: We deliver promptly in Clinceni, Ordoreanu, Domnești, and Bragadiru. Short routes ensure your food arrives hot and delicious.
